message:
SYSTEM: Enabling_ontology-based_Streaming_Data_Access2.pdf: Página 32
Objectives
• Study the existing approaches on distributed 
SPARQL query processing.
• Study the existing SPARQL query optimization 
approaches.
• Study the existing streaming SPARQL query 
processing approaches.
• Propose a coherent solution for streaming distributed 
query processing using SPARQL extensions.
• Propose a study use-case in the context of the 
SSG4E project that highlights the streaming query 
processing capabilities.
• Prepare a formal publishable version of the proposal 
for the consideration of the community
32
Enabling  Ontology-based Access to Streaming Data Sources
speaker: SYSTEM
